text: Bertola is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Adrianna Bertola (born 1999), English actress and singer *Catherine Bertola (born 1976), British artist *Ignazio Bertola, Italian military architect *Jean Bertola (1922–1989), French musician *Mariana Bertola (1865–1955), American educator, physician and reformer ==See also== *46392 Bertola, a main-belt asteroid
title: Bertola
